title: Check your email
text: Look in your inbox for an email from your boss, you need to get that thing done by tonight.

title: I have to do that thing!!
text: Gosh i'm so dumb, how could I have forgotten about that SUPER important thing! I need to use this notes app more, my memory is failing me..
